restaurants.name: Phở Việt Nam
restaurants.description: Authentic Vietnamese cuisine featuring traditional phở, bánh mì, and fresh spring rolls. Family-owned restaurant serving homemade recipes passed down through generations.
restaurants.address: 456 Little Saigon Street, Chinatown, San Francisco, CA 94108

restaurants.name: Le Petit Bistro
restaurants.description: Elegant French bistro offering classic dishes like coq au vin, beef bourguignon, and crème brûlée. Intimate atmosphere with candlelit tables and live accordion music on weekends.
restaurants.address: 789 Rue de Paris, Downtown, New York, NY 10014

restaurants.name: Sakura Sushi & Sake
restaurants.description: Contemporary Japanese restaurant specializing in fresh sushi, sashimi, and premium sake selection. Chef's omakase available by reservation.
restaurants.address: 321 Tokyo Avenue, Little Tokyo, Los Angeles, CA 90012

restaurants.name: Tacos El Mariachi
restaurants.description: Vibrant taqueria serving street-style tacos, quesadillas, and fresh guacamole. All tortillas made fresh daily in-house.
restaurants.address: 123 Mission Street, Mission District, San Francisco, CA 94110

restaurants.name: Bella Napoli Pizzeria
restaurants.description: Wood-fired Neapolitan pizza made with imported Italian ingredients. Dough fermented for 48 hours for authentic taste and texture.
restaurants.address: 567 Italian Way, North Beach, San Francisco, CA 94133

restaurants.name: Thai Spice Garden
restaurants.description: Traditional Thai restaurant with authentic flavors from Bangkok. Specializing in pad thai, green curry, and mango sticky rice.
restaurants.address: 890 Sukhumvit Road, Thai Town, Chicago, IL 60640

restaurants.name: The Steakhouse Prime
restaurants.description: Premium steakhouse featuring USDA Prime beef, aged 28 days. Extensive wine cellar with over 500 selections.
restaurants.address: 234 Fifth Avenue, Midtown, New York, NY 10001

restaurants.name: Veggie Delight
restaurants.description: Plant-based restaurant offering creative vegan and vegetarian dishes. Organic ingredients sourced from local farms.

restaurants.name: Seoul BBQ House
restaurants.description: Korean BBQ restaurant with tabletop grills. All-you-can-eat options available. Authentic banchan and kimchi made daily.

restaurants.name: Mediterranean Mezze
restaurants.description: Modern Mediterranean cuisine with mezze platters, grilled kebabs, and fresh seafood. Rooftop dining with harbor views.
